scripts.nuke: npm unlink $npm_package_name && rimraf coverage && rimraf dist && rimraf node_modules
scripts.relink: cd dist/create-angular-material-electron-app && npm run nuke && cd ../.. && npm run readme && nx build create-angular-material-electron-app && cd dist/create-angular-material-electron-app && npm link && cd ../..
scripts.delink: cd dist/create-angular-material-electron-app && npm run nuke && cd ../..
scripts.deploy: npm run readme && nx build create-angular-material-electron-app && cd dist/create-angular-material-electron-app && npm publish && cd ../..
